A wise person once told me, “You can’t pour water from an empty jug,” meaning that in order to keep giving your best, you also need to take care of your own needs. You might need to schedule some ‘me time’ once in a while for a quick energy refill. Here are some of the most effective ways I’ve found, with links in the text if you’re curious to learn more.
Pause
When it’s not possible to find ‘me time’, you might be able to find a ‘me moment’ in the day to play a quick game on your phone, listen to a song you love or read a page or two from a good book. You’ll be amazed at the calming effect this small distraction can have.
Pamper
Even if you’ve got nowhere to go, it’s fun and freeing to use your ‘me time’ to make yourself feel beautiful. Give your skin a healthy glow with an all-natural facial, or show your locks some love with a hair mask and salon styling at home. Put on a new dress and a spritz of your favourite perfume even if you’re just going to spend the evening watching TV.
Pause
When it’s not possible to find ‘me time’, you might be able to find a ‘me moment’ in the day to play a quick game on your phone, listen to a song you love or read a page or two from a good book. You’ll be amazed at the calming effect this small distraction can have.
Pamper
Even if you’ve got nowhere to go, it’s fun and freeing to use your ‘me time’ to make yourself feel beautiful. Give your skin a healthy glow with an all-natural facial, or show your locks some love with a hair mask and salon styling at home. Put on a new dress and a spritz of your favourite perfume even if you’re just going to spend the evening watching TV.
Uplift
Do something uplifting that’s just for you, like baking your favourite dessert, doing a short online course, learning a language or starting a new hobby. Another way to uplift yourself is to complete a task that’s been on your to-do list for some time, like redecorating your bathroom or finding a better way to store things around the house.
Unwind
Release the built-up tension in your mind and muscles by doing beginners’ yoga or going for a walk and breathing in some fresh air. Close the bathroom door and have a nice long bath or steam session. You could even give yourself a soothing massage.

Indulge
Then again, you could enjoy some retail therapy at homechoice.co.za
